casebody.data:
O'NAN
v.
NATIONWIDE INSURANCE COMPANY, et al. 275P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 18, 2019

Elizabeth M.T. O'Nan, For O'Nan, Elizabeth M.T.

Lucienne H. Peoples, Attorney at Law, For Servpro Industries, Inc., et al.

Mason Freeman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Nationwide Insurance Company, et al.

Gemma L. Saluta, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, For Nationwide Insurance Company, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of July 2019 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of July 2019."
